item.title: Gaza ceasefire talks on verge of collapse, Palestinian officials say
item.description: Senior Palestinian officials accuse Israel of deliberately stalling the negotiations in Qatar during the prime minister's US visit.

item.title: Federal judge says voice-over artists' AI lawsuit can move forward
item.description: The two voice over artists allege their voices were stolen by an AI voice startup.

item.title: Why cockpit audio deepens the mystery of Air India crash
item.description: Fuel cut-off switches flipped seconds after takeoff in Air India crash, preliminary report finds.

item.title: 'They were just kids': Mother mourns sons killed in Israeli strike while waiting for aid
item.description: Two of Iman al-Nouri's five sons were killed outside a clinic in Deir al-Balah on Thursday, while a third was seriously wounded.

item.title: A bridge too far? Prague railway project draws criticism
item.description: The 123-year-old Vysehrad railway bridge is set to be replaced but conservationists say it should stay.
